trans-unit.source: Defines methods and properties for writing a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Definisce metodi e proprietà per la scrittura di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.AddFixedDocument%2A> method in order to obtain a fixed-document writer for adding <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> content to an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.AddFixedDocument%2A> metodo per ottenere un writer per l'aggiunta di <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> contenuto per un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Consente di aggiungere un nuovo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: A writer for outputting the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" />.
trans-unit.target: Writer per l'output del nuovo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.AddFixedPage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il metodo <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.AddFixedPage%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The image type of the thumbnail to add.
trans-unit.target: Tipo di immagine dell'anteprima da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Adds an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" /> image for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un'immagine <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" /> per <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Nuovo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" /> per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: For example, the `imageType` might be <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.JpegImageType> or <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.PngImageType>.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, il `imageType` potrebbe essere <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.JpegImageType> o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.PngImageType>.

trans-unit.source: Only one thumbnail image can represent the document as a whole (although individual pages can have their own thumbnail images).
trans-unit.target: Una sola immagine di anteprima può rappresentare il documento nel suo complesso (anche se le pagine singole possono avere le proprie immagini di anteprima).

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown if <see cref="M:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.AddThumbnail(System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType)" /> is called when the document already has a thumbnail.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> viene generata se <see cref="M:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.AddThumbnail(System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType)" /> viene chiamato quando il documento dispone già di un'immagine di anteprima.

trans-unit.source: Flushes and closes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> writer.
trans-unit.target: Scarica e chiude il writer <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.Commit%2A> method to flush and close the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> writer.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.Commit%2A> metodo per scaricare e chiudere il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> writer.

trans-unit.source: Gets the zero-based position of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la posizione in base zero di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based position of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
trans-unit.target: Posizione in base zero di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.DocumentNumber%2A> property is zero-based.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.DocumentNumber%2A> proprietà è in base zero.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.DocumentNumber%2A> value of zero (0) indicates the first the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> in the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.DocumentNumber%2A> valore zero (0) indica il primo di <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> nel <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>.

trans-unit.source: Sets default print options for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Imposta le opzioni di stampa predefinite per <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property does not validate or modify the specified <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Impostazione di questa proprietà non convalida né modifica l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> per un particolare <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

trans-unit.source: If needed, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-specific <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is valid for a given printer.
trans-unit.target: Se necessario, utilizzare il metodo <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> per creare un <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> specifico della <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> che sia valido per una stampante specificata.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.PrintTicket%2A> property to associate a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> with a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.PrintTicket%2A> proprietà per associare un <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> con un <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
